content: and continue as you crochet round 17 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 18 round 18 1 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 round 19 decrease x 6 6 fasten_off leaving long tail for closing the hole using yarn needle close the 6 remaining stitches embroider the smile and scars using black embroidery thread this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to alter distribute publish share or post sell and reproduce this pattern you can sell the finished products made from this pattern but please credit the pattern to the chloe box tentacles using light rock the tentacles are worked into the front loops of round 15 holding your work with the top of the head facing towards you start in the first stitch using lead yarn chain 10 start in the 4th chain from the hook 7 double_crochet skip the next 2 sts of round 15 2 slip_stitch in the next 2 sts of round 15 repeat until the last st of round 15 x 4 o 8 screw b x _ o e b o e make 2 using gray l o h l c h round 1 8 single_crochet in magic_ring 8 _ c e e h round 2-3 blo 8 single_crochet 2 rounds 8 h t t m k fasten_off leaving long tail a o r o sew the screw on both sides of the body g b a e t c s a n f i stay tune for more halloween octopus i would love to see your finished halloween octopus-frankie tag me @the_chloe_box and use hashtag #thechloebox instagram the_chloe_box facebook thechloebox84 this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to alter distribute publish share or post sell and reproduce this pattern you can sell the finished products made from this pattern but please credit the pattern to the chloe box
